title: Fresh Apricot-Honey Sponge Cake (Russian Style)
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter, plus more for tin', '3 tablespoons dried breadcrumbs', '10 fresh apricots, stones removed and sliced', '5 tablespoons honey', '3 large eggs, separated', '100g caster sugar', '200g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons milk', '100g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '4 tablespoons crushed walnuts']
